column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Such a good place to come to enjoy a not so healthy dinner! Love the vibe of Bosscats at night and the bar area is a lot of fun itself! Even their patio area is nice to enjoy on a cool night out! Men typically love this place due to all the whiskey. Such a great place to host a mans birthday dinner in their whiskey room. Next time I'll remember to take pictures before everything is gone! Trust me you can not go wrong with anything here!! Can't wait to try their brunch!
